scripts.build-dist: node -- node_modules/del-cli/cli.js dist && cargo make build_release && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build-tw && node -- node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/pkg && node -- node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js index.html > dist/index.html && node -- node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js index.html > dist/index.html && node -- node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js pkg/package.js > dist/pkg/package.js && node -- node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js index.css > dist/index.css && node -- node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js pkg/package_bg.wasm dist/pkg
